org.springframework.web.reactive.function.server

Interface HandlerStrategies


  • public interface HandlerStrategies
    Defines the strategies to be used for processing HandlerFunctions. An instance of this class is immutable; instances are typically created through the mutable HandlerStrategies.Builder: either through builder() to set up default strategies, or empty() to start from scratch. Alternatively, HandlerStrategies instances can be created through of(Supplier, Supplier, Supplier).
    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Arjen Poutsma, Juergen Hoeller
    See Also:
    RouterFunctions.toHttpHandler(RouterFunction, HandlerStrategies), RouterFunctions.toHandlerMapping(RouterFunction, HandlerStrategies)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  HandlerStrategies.Builder
      A mutable builder for a HandlerStrategies.

      static HandlerStrategies.Builder builder()
      Return a mutable builder for a HandlerStrategies with default initialization.
      static HandlerStrategies.Builder builder(ApplicationContext applicationContext)
      Return a mutable builder based on the given application context.
      static HandlerStrategies.Builder empty()
      Return a mutable, empty builder for a HandlerStrategies.
      Supplier<Stream<HttpMessageReader<?>>> messageReaders()
      Supply a stream of HttpMessageReaders to be used for request body conversion.
      Supplier<Stream<HttpMessageWriter<?>>> messageWriters()
      Supply a stream of HttpMessageWriters to be used for response body conversion.
      static HandlerStrategies of(ApplicationContext applicationContext)
      Return a new HandlerStrategies based on the given application context.
      static HandlerStrategies of(Supplier<Stream<HttpMessageReader<?>>> messageReaders, Supplier<Stream<HttpMessageWriter<?>>> messageWriters, Supplier<Stream<ViewResolver>> viewResolvers)
      Return a new HandlerStrategies described by the given supplier functions.
      Supplier<Stream<ViewResolver>> viewResolvers()
      Supply a stream of ViewResolvers to be used for view name resolution.
      static HandlerStrategies withDefaults()
      Return a new HandlerStrategies with default initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • messageReaders

        Supplier<Stream<HttpMessageReader<?>>> messageReaders()
        Supply a stream of HttpMessageReaders to be used for request body conversion.
        Returns:
        the stream of message readers

      • messageWriters

        Supplier<Stream<HttpMessageWriter<?>>> messageWriters()
        Supply a stream of HttpMessageWriters to be used for response body conversion.
        Returns:
        the stream of message writers

      • viewResolvers

        Supplier<Stream<ViewResolver>> viewResolvers()
        Supply a stream of ViewResolvers to be used for view name resolution.
        Returns:
        the stream of view resolvers

      • withDefaults

        static HandlerStrategies withDefaults()
        Return a new HandlerStrategies with default initialization.
        Returns:
        the new HandlerStrategies

      • of

        static HandlerStrategies of(ApplicationContext applicationContext)
        Return a new HandlerStrategies based on the given application context. The returned supplier will search for all HttpMessageReader, HttpMessageWriter, and ViewResolver instances in the given application context and return them for messageReaders(), messageWriters(), and viewResolvers() respectively.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - the application context to base the strategies on
        Returns:
        the new HandlerStrategies

      • of

        static HandlerStrategies of(Supplier<Stream<HttpMessageReader<?>>> messageReaders,
                            Supplier<Stream<HttpMessageWriter<?>>> messageWriters,
                            Supplier<Stream<ViewResolver>> viewResolvers)
        Return a new HandlerStrategies described by the given supplier functions. All provided supplier function parameters can be null to indicate an empty stream is to be returned.
        Parameters:
        messageReaders - the supplier function for HttpMessageReader instances (can be null)
        messageWriters - the supplier function for HttpMessageWriter instances (can be null)
        viewResolvers - the supplier function for ViewResolver instances (can be null)
        Returns:
        the new HandlerStrategies

      • builder

        static HandlerStrategies.Builder builder()
        Return a mutable builder for a HandlerStrategies with default initialization.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • builder

        static HandlerStrategies.Builder builder(ApplicationContext applicationContext)
        Return a mutable builder based on the given application context. The returned builder will search for all HttpMessageReader, HttpMessageWriter, and ViewResolver instances in the given application context and return them for messageReaders(), messageWriters(), and viewResolvers() respectively.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - the application context to base the strategies on
        Returns:
        the builder

      • empty

        static HandlerStrategies.Builder empty()
        Return a mutable, empty builder for a HandlerStrategies.
        Returns:
        the builder
